product_name: Chuckit! Fetch Balls Medley - Medium - Package of 3
long_description: Heighten Rover's playtime fun with the Chuckit! Fetch Balls medley. Fetch balls bounce higher, float better and last longer than other balls used for fetch! Natural rubber is soft, durable and easy to clean. Highly visible balls are compatible with a medium Chuckit! ball launcher for hours of fun. 3-pack comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Heighten Rover's playtime fun with the Chuckit! Fetch Balls medley. Fetch balls bounce higher, float better and last longer than other balls used for fetch!
